title: Agricultural water withdrawals vs. GDP per capita
subtitle: Share of total water withdrawals (which is the sum of water withdrawals for agriculture, industrial and domestic uses) used in agriculture versus gross domestic product (GDP) per capita, measured in 2011 international-$. Agricultural water withdrawal is defined as  self-supplied water withdrawn for irrigation, livestock and aquaculture purposes.
sourceDesc: UN Food and Agricultural Organization (FAO) AQUASTAT; World Bank - World Development Indicators
